alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 29 at 2:32PM MST until January 01 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches possible, with higher amounts over mountain peaks. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 6000 feet near Alpine, Eagar- Springerville, Pinetop-Lakeside and Show Low. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Slippery and snow covered roads could led to very difficult travel on New Years Eve. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Snow forecast from 11 PM Thursday to 11 AM Saturday: Alpine 7 to 11 inches Eagar-Sprgrvlle 2 to 4 inches Pinetop-Lkside 8 to 12 inches Show Low 4 to 8 inches .
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
